postcontent:
HK's USP Compact is a small frame pistol capable of firing the most powerful cartridges in .45 ACP. These handy pistols are based on the full-size USP models and combine compact size with optimum shooting performance.

Smaller and lighter than large frame USPs, the reduction in trigger reach and grip circumference increases concealability and enhances shooting ergonomics. Unlike some subcompact designs that use a "two-finger grip" frame, the USP compact uses a narrow, full-hand grip frame with a choice of magazines between an extended or flush-fitting magazine, making the pistol easy to shoot without sacrificing conceal-ability.

Designed with a modified link-less Browning-type action, the USP compact is built to take the punishment of high-energy +P loads.

Easy to shoot, simple to maintain; the USP Compact is a safe, reliable, accurate, and concealable pistol.

title: For Sale:  Volquartsen .17 HMR with Blue Laminated Lightweight Thumbhole Stock
postcontent: The Stainless Barreled Action is where it all begins for many of our rimfire rifles. This barreled action has the right balance for offhand shooting and is as steady as can be from the bench. It starts with a CNC-machined stainless steel receiver. This receiver features an integral Picatinny rail and is threaded to accept the stainless steel barrel of your choice. The stainless steel receiver helps achieve that delicate balance that shooters are always looking for. It features all CNC-machined and wire-EDM components as we feel this is essential in building the best semi-auto rimfire rifle available. The CNC-machined bolt includes a titanium round firing pin, tuned extractor and are black nitride coated for improved performance and function. The stainless barrels can be configured in a variety of fluting patterns and the muzzle can be threaded 1/2 × 28 and fitted with one of the many compensators available. Their TG2000 trigger guard is standard on all of our barreled actions and gives the shooter a crisp, clean 2lb trigger pull. It is set up to allow for pinpoint accuracy off a bench but still be a safe, reliable trigger in the field. It has always been their goal to achieve bolt action accuracy from a semi-auto and this begins with the barrel. Volquartsen's stainless steel barrels feature match bore and chamber tolerances. title: For Sale/Trade:  Mosin Nagant Type 53/M44 carbine with Ammo *Sale Pending*
postcontent: This is a 1955 bolt action carbine rifle with side folding bayonet chambered in the very powerful and inexpensive 7.62x54r round. It is a Type 53 short carbine, not the long 91/30. Has the original barrel, and it hasn't been counter bored! You'd be hard pressed to find one with a better barrel. The bore and chamber are very bright and shiny and the rifling is in excellent condition. There is some pitting on the trigger guard but nothing major. The Mosin nagant usually comes with a very rough 12lb trigger pull. This Type 53 has had a trigger job and has a beautiful 4lb trigger! The stock was battle scarred and Bubba finished so I lightly sanded and brought it back to natural and applied Toms 1/3 wax. Gun stock has zero cracks. Bluing is about 90%. Zero cosmoline left on it. Also comes with russian issue cleaning kit, tool and oil can, and 20rds of Herters 180gr non corrosive soft points, and 100 rds of Tul Ammo fmj. Awesome scout rifle. Perfect length truck gun, deer rifle, battle rifle, or collectors piece.

title: For Trade:  Chiappa Rhino 200DS 357mag
postcontent:
FOR TRADE ONLY
Chiappa Rhino 357 model 200DS comes with factory leather holster, fiber optic front sight, case and paperwork. 
The Chiappa Rhino barrel is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before. The reduction of the recoil allows for the use of ultra light alloys to be used in the construction of the Rhino minimizing any adverse effect. The flat sided cylinder design of the Rhino reduces the typical revolver profile allowing greater concealment.

postcontent:
This beautifully crafted, genuine leather shoulder holster is in excellent condition! It was barely used. The Galco SSH modular interchangeable component shoulder system was originally known as the "Jackass Rig". A key component is its spider harness. All four points of the spider harness can pivot independently and are connected by a clover shape, Flexalon™ swivel back plate. The result is a harness that's infinitely adjustable. It follows the contours of your body as you move, thus making it extremely comfortable for all day use. This, along with patented swivel connectors, results in a perfect fit and lasting comfort for virtually all body sizes and shapes. The system consists of a model 248 holster, harness, double magazine pouch, handcuff case and a set of system screws. Holster will fit handgun with or without rails. The shoulder harness is also ambidextrous.  Demonstrating its versatility, you could assemble a two-handgun rig, a half harness system, or use the included handcuff case. The possibilities are endless.  Shoulder harness fits chest sizes up to 52". Handcuff case is detachable and belt mountable. title: For Sale:  CZ SP01 ACCU Shadow! 9mm CZ Custom Shop 91730
postcontent:
This is a very rare gun and special gun. This is a CZ SP01 completely run through by the CZ Custom Shop. 

The CZ SP-01 ACCU Shadow Custom is a competition-ready USPSA Production Division pistol, with some significant upgrades from the already great SP01 Shadow. Let’s talk about the difference

The new barrel bushing is threaded into the slide; the bushing is fitted to the barrel creating far less play than the current bushing system. The bushing also retains the new stainless steel guide plug. Ransom Rest testing at 50 yards with Fiocchi 125 JHP (A ZERO bullet) has proved group of less than 3” compared with a factory new gun at about 5.0”. At 25 yards the groups were around 1.2” a one-hole group. Very impressive!

What’s new and very exciting is the CZC SHRT reset trigger system. People have been asking for a shorter faster reset without the trigger swinging all the way forward in SA mode, now we have it.
The CZ Custom Shop has also taken almost all of the forward movement out of the single action position with the trigger moving on average less than a 1/16 (0.0625”) before stopping. They have basically created a 1911 single action on a double action gun.

Here are some more of the features included in this Custom Version of the SP01 ACCU Shadow:
• Shadow Competition Rear Sight CZ

• Fiber Optic Front Sight

• CZ Custom SA DA Hammer & Main Spring Drop in Pr B Short Reset / Swing forward Disconnector (NEW 2014) Ext Firing Pin, Lighter Spring Pin Spring (NEW 2014)

• Stainless Steel Guide Rod

• Tune Trigger Components (Reduces Single and Double action trigger pull)

• Installed and Tuned 13lb Main Spring and 11lb Recoil Spring

• Polished Disconnector and associated surfaces.

• Profiled Slide Stop For Magazine release with Heavy / Long Bullets

•Thin Black Aluminum Grips

•Includes (3) 18 round 9mm magazines.

•Reliability Check. Zero Check with Factory Ammunition

These are very rare guns and there will not be anymore built for a while so if you want one, don't wait because it may be some time before they are available again. 

We buy guns and layaway is available! Sorry, no trades and all state and local laws apply. We are an FFL dealer so you must be able to pass a background check. 3% credit card fee. We can also ship this gun to other FFLs if needed.

title: For Sale:  Used Remington 870 Police Magnum (Police Trade In)
postcontent:
This is a used "Remington 870 POLICE MAGNUM" 12-gauge pump shotgun with an 18" blue steel barrel and bead front sight. It will chamber both 2.75" or 3" magnum ammo and holds up to 6 in the tube and 1 in the chamber. It has black composite stocks with some scratches & wear from normal use. The receiver is blue steel, the barrel bore is bright with no pits and the action is in excellent condition. There are no plastic or MIM parts used on this gun (unlike the Express model). It was built to last with an action smooth-as-silk. The 870 POLICE MAGNUM has these improved characteristics: An aluminum trigger group as opposed to the plastic one used in the Express models. An old style magazine retention system. A much smoother finish inside and out with minimal machine marks or burrs. The Police gun receives a higher level of inspection and finishing and is built in a special area of the plant from 100% inspected parts. It has a one piece barrel and the bore was polished. Heavy-duty trigger / sear spring. Heavy-duty shell lifter spring. The barrel is locked down with a "ball detent" system (as opposed to the lesser grade "synthetic magazine spring retainer" lock down used in the Express models). A milled extractor (as opposed to the MIM extractor used in the Express models). Remington builds these guns specifically for law enforcement and military use. They have to be 100% reliable and able to withstand the toughest of field conditions. For these reasons, the 870 POLICE MAGNUM was built to the highest standard for endurance and reliability. 

 Has brand new Hogue Overmolded ShortStock (12″ LOP) and Forend installed

 Comes with 100 rounds of NSI Law enforcement Mini Buck 21/4 in shells

 $400 with ammo - $350 without

 BENGAL CAT NOT INCLUDED!!!

title: For Sale:  HK MR556A1 556 NATO 16.5" BLK
postcontent: For sale is a used HK MR556A1 556 NATO 16.5" BLK. A direct descendent of the HK416, the MR556A1 is a semi-automatic rifle developed by Heckler & Koch as a premium level commercial/civilian firearm with match rifle capability. Like the HK416, the MR556A1 is a major product improvement over conventional AR-type carbines and rifles. The MR556A1 uses the HK proprietary gas piston operating system, employing a piston and a solid operating “pusher” rod in place of the gas tube normally found in AR15/M16/M4-style firearms. This method of operation virtually eliminates malfunctions that are common to direct impingement gas systems since hot carbon fouling and waste gases do not enter the receiver area. This is the same key feature critical to the success of the HK416 rifles used by leading military and law enforcement customers. The MR556A1 is produced in the USA using American and German made components. The MR556A1 uses many of the same assemblies and accessories originally developed for the HK416 including the HK free-floating four-quadrant rail system. The HK Free Floating Rail System (FFRS) handguard has four MIL-STD-1913 “Picatinny” rails and allows all current accessories, sights, lights, and aimers used on M4/M16-type arms to be fitted to the MR Series. The HK rail system can be installed and removed with simple tools and returns to zero when reinstalled. The MR556A1 also has a Picantinny rail machined into the top of its upper receiver for mounting optics and mechanical sights. Unlike earlier prototypes, major subassemblies, including the MR556A1 upper receiver/barrel assembly, are fully interchangeable with other high quality AR-style firearms. MR556A1 upper receiver kits can be used to retrofit competing legacy AR systems. Like the famous HK416, the MR556A1 uses a German-made barrel produced by Heckler & Koch’s famous cold hammer forging process. The highest quality steel is used in this unique manufacturing process producing a barrel that provides superior accuracy and long service life. But unlike the HK416, the MR556A1 does not use a chrome-lined barrel. Chrome-lining can sometimes mask bore imperfections and negatively affect accuracy. For the new series of Heckler & Koch semi-automatic MR rifles, HK designers and engineers believe best accuracy comes with an unlined bore. Used with the HK Free Floating Rail System, the barrel does not touch the handguard, ensuring the barrel is truly free-floating for maximum accuracy. The unchromed barrel has an internal profile of 6 lands and grooves with a 1 in 7 inch (178 mm) twist. It is also moderately “swagged” with a slightly smaller internal diameter at the muzzle end than the chamber end. This feature has a positive effect on bullet accuracy and velocity. The thick, heavy contour 16.5-inch MR556A1 barrel also contributes to its excellent accuracy. A precise enhanced two-stage trigger adds significantly to the accuracy of the MR556A1 and an extended latch charging handle makes operating the rifle with a telescopic sight easier. The retractable buttstock can be locked into a solid, non-moving position by tightening an Allen screw in the bottom of the stock. Special target rifle takedown pins ensure the upper and lower receivers are firmly mated for accurate performance. Designed to function with a wide variety of high quality 5.56 x 45 mm ammunition, the MR556A1 uses a C.I.P. dimensioned chamber (a chamber with dimensions specified by the Commission Internationale Permanente).The MR556A1 also functions reliably with most quality Caliber .223 Remington ammunition. The MR556A1 is being produced with the same commitment to quality as German-made HK firearms. By using joint U.S./German manufacturing.(includes rifle, HK 30-round steel magazine, set of HK diopter sights, HK multi-tool, lock, and case).

postcontent:
Airweight .38 Special capable of fireing .38 Special P and .357 

explination i found online about the 360j

That is a model 360J, they've made a coupe of runs of them, the first one a few years ago. Scandium frame, steel cylinder (carbon steel originally, I'm told they have stainless cylinders now), a plain Jane no frills, lower cost, .38spl version of the M&P 360. They're great guns, very solid, they weigh a couple of ounces less than the 637 Airweight. I bought mine in 2009 for a 9mm customization project and have been very happy with it, carry it almost everyday, it has held up extremely well.

The Tactical variant of the SP-01 utilizes an ambidextrous decocker in place of the manual safety on the standard SP-01.

title: For Sale:  Kel-tec KSG Black 12ga Pump Shotgun Bull Pup 2nd gen
postcontent:
From the manufacture: This simple and reliable pump action feeds from either the left or right tube. The feed side is manually selected by a lever located behind the trigger guard.

The pump includes an under picatinny rail for the mounting of a forward grip, a light, or a laser. The included top picatinny sight rail will accept many types of optics or iron sights. Forward and rear sling loops are built in, and a basic sling is included. The soft rubber butt pad helps to tame recoil.

The KSG receiver is made from hardened steel and includes the magazine tubes which have been welded in place. The grip and stock assembly is made of glass reinforced nylon (Zytel) and is easily disassembled by pushing out 2 pins, which store in 2 holes in the grip when removed. The barrel and pump assembly is removed by loosening the 2 front magazine tube nuts with a coin and sliding the assembly forward.

title: For Sale:  Vortex Viper PST 2.5-10x32 First Focal Plane illuminated MIL/MIL, Brand New, Lifetime Unconditional Warranty
postcontent:
For sale a brand new in box Vortex Viper PST 2.5-10x32 First Focal Plane illuminated MIL reticle and MIL turrets with turret stop.

Viper PST 2.5-10x32 FFP Riflescope

The Viper PST (Precision Shooting Tactical) riflescope boasts features associated with top-tier riflescopes, yet comes in at a street price under the $1,000 mark. Matching reticle and turret measurements allow accurate, fast dialing of shots. The one-piece 30mm tube, precision-machined from a single solid block of aircraft-grade 6061-T6 aluminum, offers ample windage and elevation adjustment. Born from an intimate understanding of riflescope design, forward-thinking engineering, and open ears to a market incredibly vocal about what it wants in a riflescope, the Viper PST series delivers the performance and features tactical shooters demand at an economical price.
Optical Features
XD Lens Elements 	Extra-low dispersion (XD) glass increases resolution and color fidelity, resulting in crisp, sharp images.
XR Fully Multi-Coated 	Proprietary coatings increase light transmission with multiple anti-reflective coatings on all air-to-glass surfaces.
First Focal Plane Reticle 	Scale of reticle remains in proportion to the zoomed image. Constant subtensions allow accurate holdover and ranging at all magnifications.
Glass-etched Reticle 	Protected between two layers of glass for optimum durability and reliability.
Illuminated Reticle 	Provides precise aiming under low-light conditions.
Construction Features
Tube Size 	30 mm diameter.
Single-Piece Tube 	Maximizes alignment for improved accuracy and optimum visual performance, as well as ensures strength and waterproofness.
Aircraft-Grade Aluminum 	Constructed from a solid block of aircraft-grade aluminum for strength and rigidity.
Waterproof 	O-ring seals prevent moisture, dust and debris from penetrating the riflescope for reliable performance in all environments.
Fogproof 	Argon gas purging prevents internal fogging over a wide range of temperatures.
Shockproof 	Rugged construction withstands recoil and impact.
Hard Anodized Finish 	Highly durable low-glare matte finish helps camouflage the shooter's position.
ArmorTek 	Ultra-hard, scratch-resistant coating protects exterior lenses from scratches, oil and dirt.
Tactical-Style Turrets 	Exposed turrets provide fast, accurate and easily read elevation and windage adjustments.
Side Focus 	Adjustment located on riflescope's left side and is easily accessible from shooting position. Provides optimal image focus and parallax removal.
Internal Mechanism Design Features
CRS Zero Stop 	Customizable Rotational Stop (CRS) aids in return to zero after dialing temporary elevation correction.
Precision-Force Spring System 	Uses premium components in the erector-spring system to ensure maximum repeatability and ease of adjustment.
Precision-Glide Erector System 	Uses premium components in the zoom lens mechanism to ensure smooth magnification changes under the harshest conditions.
Convenience Features
MAG-View Fiber Optic 	Provides a highly visible reference point for the magnification setting.
Radius Bar 	Fiber optic turret rotation indicator provides a highly visible and tactile point of reference for turret rotations. US Patent 7,937,879
Fast Focus Eyepiece 	Allows quick and easy reticle focusing.
No trades.

title: For Sale:  Full body woodland III kevlar over suit. Awesome.
postcontent:
Older circa 2004 woodland EOD oversuit. Has plate chest pockets. Full front body (ankles to neck) shoulder pads and neck wrap, size large/extra large. Full chest (front/back).

Sorta heavy, I wore it once in an emergency over seas. Wore it for halloween a couple years since the back of the lower half is open, ladies seemed to dig it but i was drunk so what do I know. Wont look good if you skip leg day. But if some asshole shoots up your halloween party you'll be like "woah, did anybody else feel that shit?" I used to have a woodland beer bandoleer, can't find it. Ebay will square you away.

Will stop shrapnel and since its soft armor only should stop pistol/shotgun stuff, add plates and you can be a real life mini boss in a shitty video game. Fun piece, figured some military gear collector will like it.

Five bills is a pittance for a cool piece of gear that none of your mil gear collector buddies will have.

If you tell me your gonna come look at it, please don't waste my time. Thanks guys. If you want pics include your cell number in your email and ill text em to ya. 

First picture is over pile of armor. Second picture is some accessories, some of which are also for sale. Third is what a cake eater looks like all dressed up and ready to run missions in moms basement.

title: For Sale:  Serbu .50BMG Carbine, fear robots no more. (Price drop)
postcontent:
Is your name Sarah Conner? Do you find yourself regularly fending off unstoppable robot hordes? 

This is the lightest weight production 50.bmg rifle on the market. This isn't a Hess or some other bargain basement rifle that will explode because its made of melted geo metros in some clowns basement. Serbu has been building these rifles for a long time and the craftsmanship reflects that. The action is smooth as butter and the gun takes down easily for cleaning. 

This rifle has a 22" barrel with Serbus advanced muzzle break. This allows easy movement with the rifle (it weighs in at 17 lbs, the same as my remington 700 setup).

Plus you can rapidly engage pesky robots at close range that pop out of closets, cars, and hovercraft. Despite the short length of this maneuverable mash-up of overkill and CQM, it has little felt recoil. Of the 60 rounds through this gun, almost twenty were standing from the shoulder - fired doing typical Army ready up drills at 100m like an MRAP slaying boss. Send along a cell phone number and I will text a video of me firing it. Its great.

Comes with a heavy duty M60 sled bipod, SWFA Super Sniper Scope Rings with red dot top rail.

Comes in a rugged wheeled locking case (Pelican 1750, 350 bucks) and has custom Kaizen foam inside of it that I will include (100 value) 

Rifle comes with four loose 50 cal rounds, including armor piercing and an incendiary armor piercing for those robot mini-boss' that regular stuff cant handle. 

I've also got significant quantities of additional ammo. That stuff is expensive, but I can be persuaded to part with it if the money is right. The price of the stuff is not negotiable.

title: For Sale:  Concealed Carry Class Oregon CHL and Utah CFP 11/03/2014
postcontent:
Concealed Carry Class Utah CFP Oregon CHL

Friday, November 7, 2014 7:00 PM

Silver Dragon Martial Arts, 7881 SW Cirrus Dr Bldg 25D, Beaverton, OR 97008

Class cost is $65. Save $5 by pre-registering online!

Pre-Register Online: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-11-7-2014-Registration

This class covers everything you need to get your Oregon Concealed Handgun License and your Utah Concealed Firearms Permit. 

Our course exceeds all firearms safety training exceeds the requirements to obtain your Utah CFP, pursuant to Utah Code Title 53 Chapter 5 Section 704, and your Oregon CHL pursuant to ORS 166.291(f)(G). 

Our process starts with issuing you a packet of information, an application for your permit, and fingerprint cards that you will need. We will do your fingerprinting, take your passport photo and make copies of your driver's license before class starts. We do this so that upon completion of this class, you will have a complete packet which you can submit to Utah BCI (Bureau of Criminal Identification) with your payment. You will also have all the information you need to obtain your Oregon CHL from your local Sheriff's department. 

Subjects covered are: Basic Handgun Safety, Tactical Issues, Concealed Carry Firearm selection tips, Ammunition, Holsters, Gun Free Zones, Reciprocity, Cleaning, Storage, Firearm Transport, Justifiable Force, Criminal and Civil liability, How to interact with Law Enforcement, and how to apply for your Permit. 

After attending this class you will have a fundamental understanding about handgun safety and the rights and responsibilities and laws associated with the carrying of a concealed Handgun in multiple states. 

This is NOT a live firing class. Do NOT bring a firearm with you to the class. 

Even though the class time is only scheduled to be 2 1/2 hours long, there will be time for questions and answers after the class. 

More Information: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-11-7-2014-Schedule 
 Download a Flyer: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/ClassFlyer/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-11-7-2014.pdf 

If you are interested in just the Oregon Concealed Handgun License class visit http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/oregon-concealed-handgun-license-class-Training_Class

title: For Sale:  Wicked New Custom 20" heavy barreled AK-47 fresh build, very unique
postcontent:
Hello, 
Selling a freshly built AK47. If you are a AK purist, move on.  If you are looking for a wicked AK, read on- 
Here is the story....
I started with a MAK-90 parts kit, bought down at Knob Creek. Looked around for the best possible heat treated US made receiver for the Chinese parts. Stumbled across a company called My Guns Northwest out of Talent Oregon. The owner Matt Yeamens, is the only guy in the country (to my knowledge) that builds and sells awesome quality, pre manufactured, 1.5mm thick US replacement receivers for Chinese builds. After doing my homework, it turns out that Matt is a renowned AK builder and one of the best in the country. So, needless to say, I found my builder for the project. I bought a 20" Green Mountain rifled barrel blank, a few tasteful Tapco parts, got my stuff together and sent it off to Matt, to have him build me a killer AK. Before I sent my parts, I stumbled across Sabrewerks 13. A company that builds the best scope mounts for AK's, PSL's, RPK's, etc. After speaking with the owner, I decided on the PSL/RPK scope mount and rail because it was designed for a heavier barrel, which in turn allowed Matt to do the heavy barrel build. This mount is pressed and pinned onto the barrel and is the absolute most solid mount I've ever seen. And It should be for $250! I had Matt thread the muzzle concentrically to the bore & with 5/8x24 RH threads for standard .30 cal US muzzle accessories. Has the Tapco G2 trigger. Got the gun back and had Andy Morris of AM Custom Firearms do the matte black cerra-kote. He did an excellent job. I literally have over $1300 into this build and it runs strong and looks beautiful. Test fired for function check only. 
REDACTED

$1000 firm. Trade valve is higher. 
This thing is wicked. 
Looking for a S&W 460 or 500, Ruger Alaskan in 454, Springfield or a Xd 4" or 5" in 9mm or ?
